en: Find yourself in a world brimming with [color={important_colour}]horrors[/color] of all shapes and sizes.  Fight these monstrosities and grow until you become the ultimate nightmare you were created to be.
\t- Fight all 3 Titan Horrors\n\t- Become the Ultimate God
Keep Holding to Return to Main Menu
[color={important_colour}]Elite Killed[/color]: Wind of the West Mountains
The smell of anguish lingers in your nostrils.
A forboding taste lines your lips.
The ground quakes softly beneath you.
Your ability to flee will improve.
Your body feels easier to heal.
Your wings will protect you from horror.
